titleStmt.title: Kind-harts dreame Conteining fiue apparitions, vvith their inuectiues against abuses raigning. Deliuered by seuerall ghosts vnto him to be publisht, after Piers Penilesse post had refused the carriage. Inuita inuidiæ. by H.C.
titleStmt.author: Chettle, Henry, d. 1607?

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Wolfe and J. Danter] for William Wright,

notesStmt.note: Printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
Wolfe printed quires A-D; Danter the rest--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
